title: vaddhani nEnaNTIga (jaavali)
sahitya:
vaddani nEnaNtigA vAni jOli nIku celi

anupallavi

 tadayumOsa gADani vADiddala jErina nADE

caraNam 1

 rokkapu doravalenu cAla vakkaNagA mATalADucu
 nakka vinayamulu jEsina TakkaritO sahavAsamu 

caraNam 2

 pasalu jEsE shrInivAsuni dalacinanADE vadalaNTini
palukulanni jUcivADiddila jEsinanADE
